entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.5.5
entry.content:
Fixed log spam from scheduler.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.5.4...6.5.5

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.5.7
entry.content:
Enable/disable SSL certificate verification. Disable for self-signed certificates in private networks.

On settings under security

https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/422 - Pull Request (had to update on my end) https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/348 (original idea from @jharder01

What's Changed

  • feat: add SSL verification setting to general settings and update APIâ€¦ by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/427

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.5.6...6.5.7

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.5.8
entry.content:
Remove all refresh operations within Huntarr. By default, it was off... but was problematic with Radarr causing it to get stuck on upgrades no matter what. Since it was pointless to have within the code (been since early Huntarr), it has been removed from all apps.

You'll notice the additional options shrunk by 1 or 2 per app

Thanks to this guy pestering me as he quoted, jk... thanks for the report

What's Changed

  • Skip02 by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/428

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.5.7...6.5.8
